name: Animal Well Demo
description:
This is a small demo for the upcoming game Animal Well, made by Shared Memory and published by Big Mode. This demo was discovered in a recent ARG leading up to the announcement of Big Mode publishing Animal Well. Search the demo for secrets or get enriched in the atmosphere. Note that this is not an official upload from the devs, simply an easier way to share a cool secret the discord found. Come help with additional puzzles at the discord: https://discord.gg/y7Cbv6ctJ5

What is Animal Well?

Hatch from your flower and spelunk through the beautiful and sometimes haunting world of Animal Well, a pixelated wonder rendered in intricate audio and visual detail. Encounter lively creatures small and large, helpful and ominous as you discover unconventional upgrades and unravel the well’s secrets. This is a truly unique experience that can make you laugh in fear, surprise, or delight

Additional Links
